messages.subject: NHK Drama Book Scans
messages.msgSnippet: We can all thank Okita for lending the NHK Drama Book isbn 414923339-x to me.  I scanned some images with caught my attention and zipped them. You can download
messages.messageBody:
We can all thank Okita for lending the NHK Drama Book isbn 414923339-x
to me. I scanned some images with caught my attention and zipped them.
You can download the file at
http://www.streamload.com/secretarytocapt3 folder name "NHK" (near the
bottom) if can't remember the password then hang your head in shame
and Hijikata will think of a suitable punishment...but nevermind I'm
having some problems with the new streamload format and probably
didn't even specify the password.
If any of you need pics of certain people such as Ryoma let me
know...I concentrated on certain individuals such as Koichi Sato, Jo,
Itou, Harada and one really nice scan of Kondou! and ofcourse "kodak"
moments...Hijikata+Kondo hugging, and Hijikata's grey fundoshi....
